body:
this is fantastic!
the style, character, environment and decor is very similiar to Tsutomu Nihei's work.
just amazing!!!!

I've seen a lot of edgy shit here, but if we're talking weird, this one takes the cake. This genuinely made me uncomfortable, which rarely happens when I read a doujinshi. The idea and execution are 10/10 on the why-the-fuck-does-this-exist scale
